document.full_text: supporters of same-sex civil unions in colorado on friday vowed to keep fighting after a bill that would grant certain legal rights to gays and lesbians was defeated by a republican-controlled committee in the state legislature.
document.title: same-sex civil unions defeated in colorado legislature
lines_and_colors: supporters of same-sex civil unions in colorado on friday vowed to keep fighting after a bill that would grant certain legal rights to gays and lesbians was defeated by a republican-controlled committee in the state legislature.
